characters.story: See how the sun forms sunset? It shouts "Moo!" sharply as sunlight streams across the sky!
See how the fire forms ignite? It asks "Rahn? Kindle?" curiously!
See how the mouth forms curse? It shouts "Joh!" sharply spoken through parted lips!
The mouth stands for beast, shouting "Shoh!" sharply spoken through parted lips!
"Lee, is that a tanuki?" The inside of the dog questioned raccoon curiously - fox-like!
The mouth stands for sniff, shouting "Shyo!" sharply spoken through parted lips!
Like soil, this character means dude and whispers "Moo" - a vivid image to remember!
See how the roof forms jail? It asks "Lao? Prison?" curiously!
